attributes.action: Ensure that Archaeologist be recognized as professionals, and get paid appropriately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Archaeology is now being seen as a profession. The Majority of Archaeologists are badly paid, on unsecure contracts and generally without hope of sick leave or holiday pay. For a profession this is an unbelieveable circumstance. Progress should be made. Surely the minister in charge of culture should be actively tackling this problem.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure that Archaeologist be recognized as professionals, and get paid appropriately."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12578.asp

Prime Minister's Office
